thread.title: Ericka Williams
thread.title_full: Premier Dead Sea USA reviewed by Ericka Williams

author: Ericka Williams
title: Ericka Williams
text: This item is 1 of the best facial scrubs I seen. I gave it to a friend who experience acne and black heads on their back. I watch how in months the spots were gone and smooth. I was so amazed. My granddaughter now suffer from acne. I thought it would be great for her... Finger cross. I will post update on her soon. Thank you for your gift.
